name: It's Its! Quiz | Quiz Creation Guidelines | 15 Questions

questions.text: Its so much fun to take quizzes in Quizzyland!
questions.explanation:
No.

	It's= It is. Use it whenever you would say 'It is'.

questions.text: It's annoying to correct punctuation errors, though.
One aspect of a great quiz-- all of its questions will be well-written.
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Use 'its' when you are talking about the possessive. No apostrophe! Here's a hint- if you cannot substitute 'it's' with 'it is', you don't need an apostrophe.

questions.text: Its a shame that more people don't write quizzes about ancient Etruscan architecture!
Quizzyland- its the best place on the Internet!
A great quiz has all of its apostrophes in the right place.
The rock had a secret message inscribed on its underside, giving the next clue to 'Who Am I?'.
It's true that this is a fun and educational quiz!
FunTrivia has some real gems of games in its collection!
Its a real honour to have one of your games make the Top 40 list!
The grammar of a quiz may reflect on the education of its creator.
I want to write a quiz about Frankoma Pottery, but I fear that it's too obscure a subject.

questions.text: But hey, Frankoma Pottery is great! Have you ever seen it's fine shapes and glazes?
